Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute near Halsted/Emerald
ShortDescription: 8A S. Halsted buses temp. rrtd NB: Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, Halsted; SB: Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, Halsted; due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Halsted/Emerald.

Northbound buses will operate via Halsted, 95th, State, 87th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, 95th, then resume their normal route on Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted, 95th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage, near 95th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #9 Ashland Reroute at 95th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted near 95th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Vincennes, 103rd, Halsted, 95th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 95th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark and #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark and 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark and #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

#22 Clark buses will operate via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark.

#152 Addison buses will operate via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie-Homan
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie-Homan due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#52 Kedzie/California

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
